scripts.build: cd laptop-app && npm run build && cd ../tunnel-server && npm run build
scripts.build:watch: cd laptop-app && npm run build:watch & cd ../tunnel-server && npm run build:watch
scripts.dev:laptop-app: cd laptop-app && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env npm run dev
scripts.dev:tunnel-server: cd tunnel-server && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env npm run dev
scripts.start:laptop-app: cd laptop-app && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env npm run start
scripts.start:tunnel-server: cd tunnel-server && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env npm run start
scripts.start:laptop-app:prod: cd laptop-app && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env npm run start:prod
scripts.start:tunnel-server:prod: cd tunnel-server && DOTENV_CONFIG_PATH=./.env npm run start:prod
scripts.start:prod: npm run build && npm run start:laptop-app & npm run start:tunnel-server
scripts.type-check: cd laptop-app && npm run type-check && cd ../tunnel-server && npm run type-check
scripts.clean: cd laptop-app && npm run clean && cd ../tunnel-server && npm run clean
scripts.rebuild: cd laptop-app && npm run rebuild && cd ../tunnel-server && npm run rebuild
scripts.lint: cd laptop-app && npm run lint && cd ../tunnel-server && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd laptop-app && npm run test && cd ../tunnel-server && npm run test
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd laptop-app && npm install && cd ../tunnel-server && npm install
